HowToUse.heading: How To Use Cast Comparison
HowToUse.subheading: Find common actors between your favorite TV shows with our simple three-step process.
HowToUse.description: Our tool uses the latest technologies to ensure you get the best search and analysis experience.

step1.title: 1. Search for TV Shows
step1.point1: Enter the name of any TV show in the search bar
step1.point2: Browse through the autocomplete results that appear
step1.point3: Find the exact show you're looking for with minimum effort
step1.point4: Our database includes thousands of TV series from around the world

step2.title: 2. Select Multiple Shows
step2.point1: Click on shows in the search results to add them to your selection
step2.point2: Add as many shows as you want to compare (minimum of 2)
step2.point3: Remove any show by clicking the 'X' button if you change your mind

step3.title: 3. Analyze Cast Connections
step3.point1: Choose between 'Strict' or 'Fuzzy' mode for your analysis
step3.point2: Click the 'Analyze' button to process your selection
step3.point3: View detailed results showing common actors across your shows
step3.point4: Expand any actor's entry to see which specific shows they appeared in

question1.question: How many shows can I compare at once?
question1.answer: You can compare up to 10 shows simultaneously. This limit ensures optimal performance and accurate results.

question2.question: Is this service free to use?
question2.answer: Yes, our cast comparison tool is completely free to use with no hidden costs or premium features.

question3.question: Where does the show data come from?
question3.answer: We source our data from public TV show and movie databases that are regularly updated.

question4.question: Can I save my comparison results?
question4.answer: Currently, you cannot save results to an account, but you can take screenshots or bookmark specific comparisons.
